answers.answer: You posted in the STD forum, not sure what forum you were looking to post in but this is not the right one.

question: Today while sitting outside I noticed red spots on my thighs and legs.  Also I noticed veins that are thin and purple looking.  I noticed that my thighs pain constantly for the last few months, but I thought mabe I was just from being a little stiff.  I also have lupus and a history of diabetes in my family.  Should I be concern that cancer could be a factor.
title: Red spots on thighs and legs
